name: Castle of Spuds
description:
Best played in full screen mode (I can't make the canvas both large enough to show every detail AND have it all on screen, so you can't see the whole thing without full screen)

Credit to SalmonStock for most assets, thumnail, and general artwork

version 0.3 will add more puzzles and maybe a home hub

If there are any bugs, please comment them, so I can fix them all as soon as possible

I've been working on and off of this project for months, and I hope it goes down well with everyone :)

Changelog:

v0.2:

Added thumbnail

Made a more permenant (still changable) name

fixed box in wall bug

tweaked player movement to make the game more enjoyable

Several small visual glitches

Better lighting engine

All updates were fairly rushed just to make sure the game was playable, I will try to fix more glitches (the lighting engine specifically) over a longer and more thoughtful period of time
